pkgmetadata.longdescription: py-cpuinfo==========Py-cpuinfo gets CPU info with pure Python. Py-cpuinfo should workwithout any extra programs or libraries, beyond what your OS provides.It does not require any compilation(C/C++, assembly, et cetera) to use.It works with Python 3.Documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/workhorsy/py-cpuinfo
